paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the TTRV30M variant in the TTR gene, its effects on neurodegeneration in a Drosophila model, and provides insights into penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: TTRV30M patients develop a progressive peripheral neuropathy usually accompanied by autonomic dysfunction.

functional_data.summary: The TTRV30M variant induces neurodegeneration and affects axonal projections in Drosophila.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the specific neurotoxicity of TTRV30M.
key_quotes: The median survival rate of GMR>TTRV30M flies was reduced by 35%.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper focused on the TTRV30M variant.
